contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of October 2013, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and this appeal is REMANDED for further consideration in accord with Commonwealth v. Wilson, 620 Pa. 251, 67 A.3d 736 (2013). The Petition for Post-Submission Communication is DENIED as moot.
